title: What happened to the Huns after Attila died? - Quora

response.answer_text: Attila’s “empire” looks very impressive in a map, but it was not like their Roman rivals’ polity:  It was more a fragile alliance of convenience between several tribal groups, joined together only by the personality of Attila. Once he died, the whole building came apart, in particular in the West: eventually the Eastern half disappeared too, but it’s not clear how and when. Map from Wikicommons. ::What happened to the Huns after Attila died?::
This question was already answered here in Quora: The Huns did not disappear after Attila’s death. Check out Why did the Huns disappear so fast after Attila's death?
